title: Zygor Guides 4.0.7591 (December 3nd, 2013)
description:
Zygor Guides update Version: 4.0.7591  Released on: December 3nd, 2013


Install instructions: 

1) DO NOT USE THE OFFICIAL ZYGOR LAUNCHER FOR ANY REASON.

2) Extract the .zip and drop the ZygorGuidesViewer folder into your WoW/Interface/Addons folder and overwrite the current installation.


Mac-Only install instructions:

1) Put the ZygorGuidesViewer folder in Hard Drive/Applications/World of Warcraft/Interface/AddOns.

2) (Optional) Open World of Warcraft, login, click the Addons button on the Character Select Screen, make sure Zygor is selected, and check the "Load out of date addons" box. Some users have stated that this step is rarely/never necessary 


Changelog:

-------

[B] Professions

Fixed an error causing the guide to skip a step in the 1-520 Pandarian Cooking guide

Added a few more nodes to the Pandarian Mining guide to increase ghost iron gains

[H] Reputations/Dailies

Fixed an error regarding missing steps in the Golden Lotus Prequests

[H] Leveling

Zangarmarsh:

Added extra waypoints for additional quest mobs

Added tips and made minor changes to improve guide consistency

Switched two guide steps to improve flow

Added additional mobs to kill for a dropped quest item

Fixed a step that was auto-completing

Terokkar Forest:

Added player tips

Moved a guide step to a better spawn point for quest mobs

Added additional waypoints for more quest mobs
